mapper.insert:
insert into damage_type
damage_type.create_time,
damage_type.damage_desc,

mapper.update:
update damage_type
damage_type.create_time = #{createTime},
damage_type.damage_desc = #{damageDesc},
damage_type.damage_no = #{damageNo},
damage_type.damage_type = #{damageType},
damage_type.is_delete = #{isDelete},
damage_type.operator = #{operator},
damage_type.sort_num = #{sortNum},
damage_type.status = #{status},
damage_type.update_time = #{updateTime}
where damage_type.id = #{id}
mapper.select: select damage_type.create_time, damage_type.damage_desc, damage_type.damage_no, damage_type.damage_type, damage_type.id, damage_type.is_delete, damage_type.operator, damage_type.sort_num, damage_type.status, damage_type.update_time form damage_type where damage_type.id = #{id}
